column5: The L and J Hideaway is located in a quiet subdivision with no vehicle beach access. This ensures very little traffic on your short walk to the public dune crossover located in the subdivision.    This family friendly cabin features three bedrooms with queen beds, and two full bathrooms, offering our guests privacy. The sleeper sofa in the living room guarantees that 8 adults can sleep comfortably.  You won't regret spending time in this peaceful, quiet, piece of paradise
column8: The L and J Hideaway on Bolivar Peninsula
